testcase.classname: User could register to the e-commerce app
testcase.name: User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the registration page...............................passed When User enters the gender female..........................................passed And User enters the first name "engy".......................................passed And User enters the last name "test"........................................passed And User enters the birth date..............................................passed And User enters the email "a@v.com".........................................passed And User enters the company name "BB".......................................passed And User selects the newsletter.............................................passed And User enters password "12345678" and confirmation password "12345678"....passed And User press register button..............................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: User could login to his account on the e-commerce app
testcase.name: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to the login page.......................................passed And User enters email "a@v.com".............................................passed And User enter password "12345678"..........................................passed And User press login button.................................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: User could login to his account on the e-commerce app
testcase.name: User could log in with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to the login page.......................................passed And User enters email "a@q.com".............................................passed And User enter password "123678"............................................passed And User press login button.................................................passed Then user could not login to the system successfully........................passed

testcase.classname: User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: Given User press the currencies list and Select the "Euro" currency.........passed Then The currency of the prices of the products will be "€".................passed

testcase.name: user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given User hover category name "Computers" and press subcategory "Desktops" if found.passed Then the category name "Desktops" will be displayed.........................passed
